short_description: Discover Bulgaria, a Balkan nation where ancient history meets natural beauty. Explore the Black Sea coast, hike in the Rila and Pirin mountains, visit stunning Orthodox monasteries, experience rich cultural heritage, and enjoy the warm hospitality of the Bulgarian people.

health.tap_water_safety: Generally safe in major cities, bottled water recommended in some areas
alcohol_info: It is prohibited to sell, serve, or offer alcohol beverages to anyone under the age of 18
Alcohol can be purchased from licensed venues, supermarkets, and shops
Bulgaria is known for its wine production

tipping.hotels: Small tips for porters and housekeeping are appreciated
tipping.guides: 10% tip is appreciated for tour guides
tipping.restaurants: 10% tip is customary for good service, though not always expected
tipping.taxis: Rounding up the fare is common

weather.title: Bulgaria has a continental climate with hot summers and cold winters. The Black Sea coast experiences a more moderate climate, while the mountains have alpine conditions with heavy snowfall in winter.

when_to_visit.title: Summer
when_to_visit.short_description: Warm to hot temperatures perfect for beach activities along the Black Sea coast, hiking in the mountains, and exploring cities. Ideal time to visit Varna, Burgas, and enjoy outdoor activities

when_to_visit.title: Spring & Autumn
when_to_visit.time_period: April to May, September to October
when_to_visit.short_description: Mild and pleasant temperatures with beautiful seasonal colors. Perfect for sightseeing, exploring historic cities like Plovdiv and Sofia, visiting monasteries, and hiking in the mountains

when_to_visit.title: Winter
when_to_visit.short_description: Cold temperatures, especially in the mountains. Great for winter sports in Bansko, Borovets, and Pamporovo. City breaks in Sofia and Plovdiv are still possible, though colder

when_to_visit.title: Rose Festival
when_to_visit.short_description: Experience the famous Rose Festival in the Rose Valley, particularly in Kazanlak. Beautiful weather and unique cultural celebration. Perfect time to visit the region

weather.best_time: The best time to visit Bulgaria is during the spring (April to May) and autumn (September to October) months when the weather is mild and pleasant, making it ideal for exploring historic cities, visiting monasteries, hiking in the mountains, and enjoying cultural attractions
